attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I love our lord and savior Donald trump😻😻. Unfortunately this app crashes all the time. I can’t interact with anything on the app and it crashes every time I open it😡😡😡
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!

attributes.review: This app is one of the most horrible apps I’ve ever downloaded. Right when I opened the trump app it made a noise that was unheard by the human ear; but to my dogs, the noice was freaking them out. Also it’s just a dumb app. #freetiktok
attributes.title: Rat

attributes.review: i downloaded this to keep up with trumps campaign for 2020, and IT TOOK LIKE 20 mins to download, the articles had grammatical errors, and it gave my phone a glitch to where u had to power off my phone everytime!!! TRUMP, WTH IS THIS?
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is honestly so bad and worthless the app isnt up to date and does not have good news i saw this app on one of my recommendations but i will never come back to this PEOPLE DONT GET THIS APP!!! This is a scammm and will give you virus’s
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I hate it. It is all so horrible, and not worth your time. Who ever invented this app need to be educated ASAP. I am upset for wasting my time in this dumb app, but I had to let the world know it ain’t worth it.
attributes.title: The app should be abolished

attributes.review: I download this app to praise the goddess king orange but when I opened the app orange popped and farted out of the screen and it scared me and my fish but my fish when and saved the day and won the election #kingorange2020 #fishy2020 #goddess #orange then I ate king orange for lunch he was a little Moldy
attributes.title: 🍊king orange

attributes.review: This is the worse app I’ve ever seen in my life it’s messing with my brand new phone it glitches and it keeps notifications every second this app is terrible
attributes.title: Nn

attributes.review: This is one of the WORST apps I have EVER used. DELETE IT NOW!!!! it uses your location even when the app is closed!!!! terrible!!! and slow!!! it slowed my phone down AND the battery life decreased! DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: very disappointed

attributes.review: every time i got on this app there were bugs, glitches and when i got on it i was sent to a different app of sent home😡😡nothing worked the way i wanted it to!! VERY DISAPPOINTED 😡😭
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. It asks me for my phone number right off the bat and that deprived me of my right to privacy! I don’t want the government knowing my information like that. Don’t get this app it’s a trap!!!
attributes.title: Worst app
